title: Chaos or Order
body:
I just logged into league of legends and i have seen that the chaos "line" has gone longer and went threw orders "line" does that mean chaos is winning?. if so that is awesome i have been grinding chaos tokens to make chaos win..
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Where can I track the progress of this?
The winner is determine by the overwhelming color, not where the knob is.  It looks like currently, Chaos is in the lead.  Who will help restore order?  :D

any chance we can trade our victory token with a loser token in the end, really find he chaos one meh (just ugly yas skin who stand still) while the order one is more talkative (riven who ascend to kayle tier being)
I don't think so!  You better grab your friends and push for Order!

such a waste of good art, hope it will be in the legacy vault after the event so we can get it via hexteck crafting or special sale (because let's be honest, despise seeing more order icon than chaos icon in my region, it seems yas will win anyway)

league logic;

badass demon with awesome particles and effects < super saiyan with tits
